lyrics.line: It's only common sense
So please don't take offense
I gotta say what's on my mind
'Cause all this bitterness
Has made me second guess
And I've waited all my life
You know it's true
It isn't me, it isn't you
I can't be your man
But here's what I don't understand
If I can't live without you
But I can't breathe when I'm with you
What are we really doing here?
I don't wanna live without you
But God only knows what I've been through
'Cause dying is all we're doing here
You leave me suffering
'Til I can't feel a thing
It's all I got when I want more
If I waste one more day
Then they can take me away
'Cause it will be worse than it was before
You know it's true
It isn't me, it isn't you
I can't be your man
But here's what I don't understand
If I can't live without you
But I can't breathe when I'm with you
What are we really doing here?
I don't wanna live without you
But God only knows what I've been through
'Cause dying is all we're doing here
If I can't live without you
But I can't breathe when I'm with you
What are we really doing here?
I don't wanna live without you
But God only knows what I've been through
'Cause dying is all we're doing here
If I can't live without you
But I can't breathe when I'm with you
What are we really doing...
What are we really doing here?
I don't wanna live without you
I don't wanna live without you
'Cause dying is all we're doing...
Here
